phrases: Wow, the staff around Yunosagi are very capable.
I had not expected you to
bring such large-scale equipment with you.
The cameraman works in the special effects department,
so he is actually better at filming stunts like this.
Let us film the next scene!
Do you have a moment, Madam Manager?
Let me get straight to the point.
You received an offer for a movie to be shot at the inn, did not you?
You did not accept that offer, did you?
If you have not accepted it yet, that is good.
I have left Enishi in charge of that.
I am telling you, something is fishy about the whole thing!
You can call it off right now by just opening your mouth!
This time I do not plan on interfering at all.
How do you feel about inheriting this inn?
Actually, no, Enishi will be the one.
Enishi will be the one who inherits Kissuiso, Mom.
I have just said something pretty foolish, have not I?
But it is all in the past now.
That is your job, young master.
We were watching you from up here!
I hear that they are shooting a film here?
What you were doing was very interesting!
Do not worry, we will still be at your service as usual.
I know how well you have been taking care of us.
Were you the one who jumped from the building just then?
you might want to refrain from watching what is coming next.
What is this movie supposed to be about, precisely?
The proposal said, waitresses in their youth.
That all the madam managers in
the union do not like this upcoming movie.
Well, I think everyone gets a little
uneasy when trying out something new.
Even though they are not the ones staging it?
Would not you be jealous if someone became
but there are not exactly many scenes in this film where lots
All the madam managers can go to
a hot spring for a work trip.
And then they all become zombies.
A meal for two in the Paulownia Room, please!
I will take this to the Wisteria Room.
The meal with the red tag
has no green onions in it.
A customer in the Wisteria Room
kept staring at my face earlier.
I will be on my way!
The next time we are here, we will be shooting for real.
I am counting on you, Mr. Isami.
I am turning this on, young master.
I hear it is a scam.
I had my suspicions from the start!
This has got nothing to do with you.
The folks at Kissuiso have really done it this time.
You still have not managed to contact Mr. Isami?!
No, I only received an e-mail from him saying
that the project had been called off.
I will try calling him again later.
I had my suspicions about this from the start!
You are telling me this now?
Do not rush the payment and
only pay them once you have confirmed that it is safe.
Anyway, the contract is under your name, Enishi!
But you are the one who told me about this in the first place, Takako!
What is going to happen to the young master?
I did hear he paid them a lot of money, though.
It is his fault for listening to that dumb woman.
The characters in his name must stand for,
Stepping out of the ring and following someone is mistake!
I will peel the white radish.
I knew that Tohru was tactless,
but I still think that a good chef can be.
Too bad we did not get to act in it.
What are you going to do now?
I was thinking that this would be the summer break to remember.
because I thought Kissuiso would be in a mess,
but I am glad to be wrong.
But you only just got here!
I guess she does not know much about it.
This is just me talking to myself.
He is run from debt twice in his life before,
and he was laid off by the people in his industry.
I am pretty sure he is used the money to pay off his debts,
so it will be too difficult to get it back.
The actors and the staff who mistakenly got involved with him
are probably going to be in trouble for a while.
I do not plan on crying over spilled milk,
and I still do not believe that what I was trying
But just remember that the investors are responsible for the result.
But you are also responsible for the staff and the customers.
Well, I mean, everyone makes mistakes.
Strawberry flavor is the best after all.
I figured I would clean the area surrounding the pool.
But the movie's been called off.
I have been cleaning the pool every day recently,
so it is sort of become one of my tasks now.
I just cannot stand not cleaning it.
Oh, you two are going as well?
Minko's already gone ahead of you.
For the same reason as you.
That pool is not only for the movie.
I have got a lot of things which I need to take care of.
I want to go with you.
I do not have time to babysit you any longer!
You are the one who is responsible for this incident.
But, Takako, we handed him the contract together!
We discussed it and decided together!
Why do not you go and ask your beloved sister for help then?
Do not you dare say bad things about my sister!
You are exactly like Madam Manager.
You are a woman who is able to strike back!
Talking about who is responsible here will not help us at all!
I want you to show me how cool you are!
What nonsense are you spouting now?
Just because it is English does not mean you can just say anything.
I said, do not mind me!
Do you want me to hold on or let go?!
I cannot stand this any longer!
Can you hear me, young master?!
I will not let this be over yet, do you hear?!
Why do not you try standing?
And you are paying for it!
So you were wearing your battle gear...
Like I said, they were expensive!
What the heck are you saying?!
I have always said that your independent and
peculiar way of thinking is one of your major flaws-
This time, we will do it together.
We should not watch any more.
I thought I would act like a mother for once.
Kissuiso's got a lot to take care of now.
Well, I hate to say this,
but they brought this upon themselves.
They were walking on air, were not they?
I did walk on air when I leaped from the second story window.
There was also a scene like that.
Sorry to hear the bad news.
I thought it would be best
if I let you, the representatives of Yunosagi,
The meal for the Wave Room is ready.
Is the sashimi for the Crane Room still not ready?
I should have been the one to go and explain.
Thank you very much, and I apologize.
But Ms. Kawajiri really had Kissuiso on her mind,
and did her best to make things work.
Ms. Kawajiri will have to take her share of the responsibility.
Mom, I am not defending her or anything.
She really was trying her best.
You can tell me this later.
I am happy that you have grown enough to be able
whether you were simply stubborn or just clumsy.
Are you talking about the piano lessons?
able to play an instrument would get me the girls.
But you kept refusing to take lessons in elementary school.
If only you would put a collar on me and taken me to those lessons,
my teenage life would have been a lot different.
You were a terrible swimmer too.
If I were a mermaid princess...
I would not admire a prince...
Episode 18 A Mermaid Princess and a She Will Bra
